noAccess.messageAnon: You don't have permission to access any applications.
noAccess.hint: Please contact an administrator if you believe this is an error.

settings.heading: Settings

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.heading: Welcome, {{user}}!
welcome.message: Your account has been created and you're all set. You now have access to your personal dashboard.

expired.title: Invite Expired
expired.message: This invite has expired. Use the link in your invitation email to request a new one.

used.title: Already Joined
used.message: This invite has already been used. If you need help, contact the person who invited you.

password.title: Certificate Password
password.warning: Scratch to reveal your certificate password. Save it — you'll need it to install the certificate from your email.
password.consumed: The certificate password has already been revealed. If you need a new invite, use the link in your original invitation email.

cert.notInstalled: It looks like your certificate isn't installed yet. Install the .p12 file from your email, then refresh this page.

certRequired.title: Certificate Required
certRequired.message: Your certificate isn't installed yet. Go back to install it first, then return here.

validation.usernameFormat: Username must be 3-32 characters (letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores)
validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 12 characters

reinvite.title: Request New Invite
reinvite.heading: Request New Invite
reinvite.message: Your previous invite for {{email}} has expired or the certificate password was already revealed. You can request a fresh invite below.

success.title: New Invite Sent
success.message: A new invitation email has been sent to {{email}}. Check your inbox for the new link and certificate.

error.title: Oops!
error.404msg: The requested page could not be found.

invite.subject: You've been invited to {{appName}}
invite.heading: Welcome to {{appName}}

step1.title: Step 1: Install Your Certificate
step1.body: Your security certificate is attached to this email as certificate.p12. You'll see the password to install it when you click the link below.
step1.macos: macOS: Double-click the .p12 file to open Keychain Access, enter the password when prompted, then trust the certificate.
step1.windows: Windows: Double-click the .p12 file, follow the Certificate Import Wizard, and enter the password when prompted.

step2.title: Step 2: Create Your Account
step2.body: After installing your certificate, click the button below to create your account.

invite.footer: This link expires in 7 days. Need a new invite? Request one here. If you didn't expect this invitation, you can safely ignore this email.

renewal.subject: Your {{appName}} certificate has been renewed
renewal.heading: Certificate Renewed
renewal.body: Your security certificate for {{appName}} has been renewed. A new certificate is attached to this email as certificate.p12.

install.title: Install Your New Certificate
install.body: Please install this certificate to continue accessing {{appName}} services. You may need to remove the old certificate first.
install.macos: macOS: Double-click the .p12 file to open Keychain Access, enter the password when prompted, then trust the certificate. You can remove the old certificate from Keychain Access.
install.windows: Windows: Double-click the .p12 file, follow the Certificate Import Wizard, and enter the password when prompted. You can remove the old certificate from the Certificate Manager.

renewal.footer: This is an automated renewal. Your account and access remain unchanged — only the certificate has been updated. If you didn't expect this, please contact your administrator.
